description: misc/dashboard: record install counts for external packages

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

FYI the idea here is that the build package does all writes to the
datastore, and the new pkg.golang.org UI (not in this CL) will be
read-only. That should make it much easier to avoid issues with
sharing the datastore between versions.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6223c9fe432b ***

misc/dashboard: record install counts for external packages

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5699082

subject: code review 5699082: misc/dashboard: record install counts for external packages
